name: sales_offer_poster
description: Promo template with blue background, bold headline, cookie image, and CTA button

fieldPrompt.background_image_url: Create a detailed prompt for a vibrant, high-resolution background featuring fresh fruits and natural elements. Include specific details about the composition, colors, lighting, and aesthetic. The image should have a clean, modern look with good contrast to ensure text remains readable, and include space in the center for product placement and text overlay.
fieldPrompt.logo_url: Create a detailed prompt for your brand logo. Specify high-resolution image with transparent background that represents your brand identity effectively. Include details about clarity, recognition, and brand consistency to ensure professional presentation.
fieldPrompt.headline: Write a compelling headline (max 20 characters) that grabs attention and focuses on the main benefit or offer. Examples: Fresh & Natural, Premium Quality, Limited Time Offer. Make it impactful and benefit-focused.
fieldPrompt.subtitle: Create a short, engaging subtitle (max 30 characters) that supports your headline and highlights key benefits or features. Examples: Handpicked daily for maximum freshness, Premium ingredients, authentic taste. Focus on what makes your offering special.
fieldPrompt.theme_color: Select a hex color code (e.g., #4CAF50 for green, #FF6B6B for red) that matches your brand identity and creates visual harmony with your product. Choose colors that evoke the right emotions and align with your target audience.
fieldPrompt.cta_text: Create a clear call-to-action (max 10 characters) that encourages immediate response. Examples: Shop Now, Learn More, Get Started, Order Today. Make it action-oriented and compelling.
fieldPrompt.product_image_url: Create a detailed prompt for a high-quality image of the product. Include specific details about lighting, composition, and styling. The image should be well-lit, professional, and evoke warmth and care. For best results, specify an image with a transparent background or a clean, uncluttered background.
